trustfund:
TF037029-LAC REGION - HEALTH FOR COSTA
            RICA, HONDURAS, NICARAGUA, BRAZIL,TF034155-LATIN AMERICA REGION - HEATLH PROJECTS,TF026555-HEALTH SECTOR REFORM PROJECT,TF020575-SOCIAL SECTOR RESTRUCTURING,TF023015-PHRD-HEALTH SECTOR PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The overall project assessment is rated
            unsatisfactory. The sustainability of project activities is
            rated as uncertain, but prospects are reasonable because of
            continued support under other projects. Overall World Bank
            performance was unsatisfacotry while Borrower performance
            was mixed. Lessons learned included the following: The
            strategy of using fairly independent project units to manage
            project execution as a means of compensating for weak or
            inexperienced line agency counterparts can work against the
            objective of maintaining a strong sense of counterpart
            ownership. To a large degree it is up to the national
            leadership to make this inherently difficult relationship
            work. Flexibility and simplicity of project design are
            critical to avoid overwhelming the institutional capacity of
            counterparts, especially in cases of first projects within a
            sector. Clear and sustained government commitment and
            leadership is indispensable to the success of major reform
            efforts. Areas requiring cooperation among line institutions
            need to be addressed at a project's outset to avoid
            delays during implementation. For complex sector reform
            programs involving a multiplicity of actions by different
            actors and the gradual build-up of institutional capacities
            to implement and sustain the changes, the adaptable program
            loan/credit instrument may be preferable to a one-time
            sector investment project. Effective donor coordination is
            essential throughout project implementation, not just
            project design.
